TVD-R.BK.summary: TV Direct Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, sells goods and services through various marketing channels. It sells health and beauty products, household products, kitchen utensils, exercise products, and fashion products through the satellite and digital television, cable TV, outdoor call centers, printed media, websites, and mobile applications, as well as retail distribution through TVD shop. The company also produces and sells TV programs, and sells airtime for advertising, as well as offers data center, and life insurance brokerage and other services. As of June 30, 2020, it operated 69 distribution centers in Bangkok and other provinces. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
